title: looking to join/create a 5v5 ranked team for silver players ~ [LFT] [LFP] [LFM]
body:
hey guys im looking to join/create a active OCE 5v5 ranked team, thinking of starting with only silver players with around all the same skill. The reason i go so far for this is because all my friends are moving onto other games & im not quite ready yet and i still enjoy league a lot but i have no one to play with. Solo queue is okay but there are too many trolls/afks and im over it. 

the team doesnt have to have only 5 players, of course but i would prefer at least 5 active players. we can communicate lots & climb the ladder together, is anyone keen on getting together and destroying some kids? because i am. c:

(RACE/GENDER) doesnt make any difference to me, i love meeting new people & learning new languages etc. no racism will be accepted. obviously prefer anyone that can speak english so we can communicate xD. but other than that come along & join!

any questions? ADD/message me on my league account in game name : Rezar        ~~~~ im silver 2 on this account & have others but will be very active on this one. or you can message me via reddit/thisforum.
 reddit; Fliicky
leave your thoughts and any extra questions below. gl hf on the rift. [LFT] [LFP] [LFM]

replies.body: Hey man in a similar situation add me if your keen adc main
i would like to join im silver II would like to be a mid laner but can play anything
hi man add me i main mid jg and sup (mid sup pref)
everyone is fine to add me im keen :D
add me mate, coz i am sick of soloing i need people whom i can have fun

Hey Man, i came on here looking for the exact same thing. I'd love to join you, the amount of afk's and trolls I have to put up with is ridiculous, and since i main sup id like to be partnered with a decent adc for a change! cheers bro
Hey i'd love to join add me in game darkderma and we can discuss :)
